## Tender Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Lethbridge Research and Development Centre at 5403 1st Avenue South, Lethbridge, Alberta requires a contractor to provide mechanical services on an “as and when requested basis” for a period of one calendar year with the possibility to extend for three additional one-year periods. The anticipated start date is November 1, 2023.

## Mandatory Technical Requirements
Security Requirements: Contractor/offeror personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by AAFC.

Optional Site Visit Information: It is recommended that the Bidder or a representative visit the work site on Tuesday, September 19, 2023 at 10:00 am MDT.

## Bidding and Submission Instructions
Bids must be submitted using the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation to transmit bids electronically. Bids must be submitted only to Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Bid Receiving Unit by the date, time and place indicated in the bid solicitation.

## Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be assessed in accordance with the entire requirement of the bid solicitation, including technical and financial evaluation criteria.

## Important Notice
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
